body.name: BELLA Two Tier Food Steamer with Dishwasher Safe Lids and Stackable Baskets & Removable Base for Fast Simultaneous Cooking - Auto Shutoff & Boil Dry Protection, 7.4 QT, Black

features: COOK A VARIETY OF FOODS: Whether you're in the mood for japanese or chinese cuisine, or just want to steam some fresh vegetables, tofu, fish or meats for dinner, this steamer and rice cooker can do it all. Turn the switch and make a full meal with sides

TWO TIERS FOR SIMULTANEOUS COOKING: With the electric food steamer, you can cook multiple items at the same time without mixing them together! The steam pot comes with a guess-free steaming guide chart that makes it easy to make your favorite dishes

STACKABLE BASKETS & REMOVABLE BASE: The removable base makes it easy to clean your electric cooker and veggie steamer. The stackable glass baskets make it easy to store your food once it's done and can be removed safely washed in your dishwasher

EASY TO READ WATER LEVEL INDICATOR: No more guessing when it's time to refill your water! BELLA's vegetable steamer is equipped with a clear water level indicator that tells you exactly how much liquid is left so you can refill the steamer pot comfortably

AUTO SHUTOFF & BOIL DRY PROTECTION: The auto shutoff and boil dry protection will turn the rice steamer off automatically if it's left on for too long or runs out of water. This prevents any accidents from happening and makes it simple and safe to use
body.description: The veggie and egg steamer is a great way to cook multiple items at the same time. The two tier system separates different types of food, and the stackable glass baskets make it easy to cook fish, dumplings, meat, rice and more at the same time. The easy-to-read water level indicator means you can refill the large pot with ease, and the dishwasher-safe design makes it easy to clean after every use. The steamer also features an auto shutoff and boil dry protection function for safety, and a quick start heating system that makes it ready to steam in as little as 30 seconds. Plus, the included vegetables tray and lid keep your food as close to its natural raw state as possible, ensuring that they are cooked perfectly every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and Convenient Cooking
reviews.reviewText: This is surprisingly fast and easy to use. This was an upgrade from the more traditional bamboo steamer I've always used. The bamboo steamer was a bit small and never quite fit any of the pots I've ever owned, so I was always afraid of one or both layers toppling over.This steamer, being it's own unit, fits perfectly on the base using either 1 or 2 of the steaming trays. You can see the food, see the remaining water level, and add water as needed while cooking. None of this is possible using a bamboo or metal steamer without removing the lid and/or steaming trays from the pot. That convenience alone is what makes me really enjoy this cooker.On top of that, cook times have been way less than using the old bamboo steamer. I think the more secure connection this steamer has, as well as the abundance of holes in both trays eliminating blockages plays a rule in the faster cooking time. Additionally, the size of the trays are perfect for preparing a meal for 5+ people.I am really happy to have finally made this purchase. One I've been putting off for years because my bamboo steamer was "good enough". I never really thought it could be this great though. Would definitely buy again, and definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steaming made easier.
reviews.reviewText: Love my new Bella stackable steamer. Works great and very easy to use and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product and worth the $$
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This steamer is the best Amazon purchase I ever made. It’s easy to use & the food comes out amazing, if you’re thinking about purchasing this, do it!Great for busy couples who enjoy eating healthy ♥️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact Yet Great Addition to your kitchen
reviews.reviewText: Great for steaming food! If you plan to use this for steaming buns like siopao, try to be extra careful with temperature. Sudden change of temperature in the case of steaming siopao could make your buns brown. There is no button or setting to control the temperature of the steamer.Also, the water droplets are evident on the food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The steamer is great and the prices awesome. Definitely buy it. I highly recommend . I gave 1 to my brother. This is my second 1for myself. The first one I had for probably fifteen years and I dropped it off of a very high cabinet and it broke..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this steamer!
reviews.reviewText: I've always wanted a food steamer and finally ordered this one. It has exceeded my expectations! I made king crab legs in it when I first got it and they turned out fabulous! Then just made some tilapia fillets and they were amazing too. Tried some frozen snow crab legs over the last weekend and they were perfect! So easy to set it up and to use as well as to clean it too! Double stacking trays means you can make a lot all at once and be ready to eat in 10-20 minutes on most of the items above I made. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for times of "Food Sensitivity"
reviews.reviewText: Had a scheduled surgery involving my mouth and the medical staff warned me I would have some extreme mouth sensitivity to flavors and hard/crunchy textures for a couple weeks. Basically I invested in this thing to help cook foods softer that I knew my mouth could handle and I could control both the seasoning and salt levels.>WHAT YOU NEED BEFORE PURCHASE:Invest in some great seasonings, (Ideally Salt Free) YOU WILL THANK YOURSELF.Flavor God and FitMenCook are my go to brands.>THE GREAT:It works and it works well. Because I was also away from work for a couple weeks, I basically played the game of "DOES IT STEAM?" You will be surprised what you can steam, the freshness of the food. My go to was soft fish and soft vegetables like carrots, cauliflower, sweet potato. I actually enjoyed the natural flavors of the food, without seasoning. However, as my mouth healed I started introducing flavors to keep me interested. It does a great job and steaming ground pork and beef! Great recipe over noodles or rice.THE GOOD:Size is pretty good. You can put enough food in here for more than one person or if you are meal prepping. I also like the double decker compacity to do more than one type of food item at a time. The heating picks up very quickly and your food cooks fast.THE NOT SO GOOD:Theres a small learning curve you will need to get use too. Alot of us know when food is done by look or smell. Since the cook baskets get foggy you cant rely on look unless you want to lift the lid which compromises the heat. (Not a major deal at all). Honestly it was nice playing around with different food variety. There is a guide which tells you how long certain food should cook so you wont go in blind.>My only gripe would be the cooking timer aesthetics. The numbers on the dial are black. They are very hard to see unless you are directly in front of dial or bend down. This is kind of a "set it and forget" type device so this isn't a deal breaker but more of a final design flaw.>OVERALL:Great product to cook with, control your salt intake, eat healthier foods overall. My favorites items arefish, store bought dumplings, root vegetables, ground pork.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad I bought it!
reviews.reviewText: We tried our new food steamer tonight! We had some frozen shrimp and steamed it. It turned out perfect! Can't wait to do our veggies next!
Muy buen equipo y funciona bien

So, it's July 2022 and I've had this since early December 2021. This is one of the most used items I've bought in ages!! I use it every day, be it to cook some eggs or steam some vegetables for part of dinner or a quick snack. It doesn't take up a whole lot of counter space, and works very simply & efficiently.This is likely one of my favourite & useful purchases from Amazon--(which is saying a lot!!).If you've ever struggled to peel hard-boiled eggs, your difficult mission ends here. - I still haven't worked out the secret, but you can make up to 16 eggs at a time and all you have to do is chill them in the fridge (hot might work, too-- haven't tried it) and then crack the bottom and peel.-- I do it under a stream of water and each egg takes about 10-15 seconds. -Magic!!This is great for all types of vegetables-- haven't tried it on fruit, as that's not really up my alley, but I'm sure it would be a success also.I know this review is long, but if you're looking for something like this, I wanted to give my full take on it. :) I'm sure there are many uses I haven't even explored, but this is most definitely worth your money!~Chantal :)
Un artículo excelente en todo. Fácil de usar aún que seria bueno un recetario que saquen para tener más diversidad de alimentos en preparar

Our old, digital big-brand steamer died so we bought this as a panic-buy. We are so happy with it!! The tiers are as expected, not smaller or bigger than we need. Our only gripe is that it's quite hard to see the ticks on the timer to set the time. They should have used contrasting colors. But the product works great. The trays are fine in the top dishwasher rack.
Steams quickly and quite happy with this product. I do recommend if you have hard water in your area such as Alberta to use vinegar periodically to clean the element. Thumbs up.
